title: New Keyboard and League in game does NOT like it
body:
Ive just gotten a replacement keyboard and mouse set (i had the exact same one previously but the mouse broke due to over right clicking.

anyway they replaced both mouse and keyboard, and the new keyboard is having issues in game. for instance i cant use left shift and enter for all chat but must use right shift and enter.

Another issue is holding space to lock camera and trying to press 4 for my trinket, it refuses to acknowledge the fact that im trying to use my trinket until i let go of the space bar

Im going to guess its a keyboard issue and not game issue as my previous keyboard never had this problem occur, but im just wanting to check if you guys have anything that might fix this issue, because it seems to be only league that this issue occurs with.

replies.body: As QAPLA said updating drivers is a good first step if they aren't already. Past that, do you have any peripheral software to go with it (Razer Synapse, CUE, whatever Logitech's is called etc)?

I'll have to update the driver and no i dont have any of those sorts of softwares, im rather stupid when it comes to software systems and such, thankyou both!

now i have to figure out how to update said drivers lmao
What kind of keyboard do you have (brand)?
TtEsports Commander multi-light keyboard and mouse set is what i got

Hmmm, looking at the specs, it does have both of these functions: 
Fn+Print SysRq (Lock Windows Key)
Fn+Print Num Lk (Lock Full Key)

I'm not sure how to tell if they're on or not, but try toggling them and see if ti changes anything maybe?
Tried them both sadly no change it seems, i think its just some issue with this keyboard and the game no mixing im unsure, if it continues ill just take the keyboard back.
I would recommend contacting TT support if they have it. They're probably more able to help you than Riot support is :( Sorry I couldn't do more.
Thats all Good! i had expected it was keyboard  issues not game issues, but still thankyou for trying to help i really do appreciate it! Thanks Seras.
Best of luck :) I've never had any TT peripherals so I'm not real familiar with them :(
Have you tried updating the driver?
